Diselubungi dengan misteri sehingga menimbulkan huru hara di sekitar perkelilingan orang - orang yang disayangi Hariz.

programme.title: Anak Abah
programme.desc: Zarith yang masih menuntut di luar negara terpaksa pulang ke tanah air untuk menjadi pengerusi dan menguruskan resort peninggalan ayahnya yang meninggal secara tiba-tiba akibat serangan jantung.Farhan yang merupakan salah seorang eksekutif resort tersebut tidak bersetuju di atas perlantikan tersebut kerana usia Zarith yang masih terlalu muda dan kurang pengalaman.Mujur ada Pak Din,pembantu peribadi arwah ayahnya dan Nina, setiausaha ayahnya yang selalu mendorong dan menyokong Zarith.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin
programme.desc: Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin tetapi mempunyai satu fobia dimana dia takut untuk bersanding dia atas pelamin setelah apa yang terjadi keatas dirinya semasa dia kecil. Dalam masa yang sama, Johari juga mempunyai masalah yang sama dengan Aliah. Mereka telah bertemu di dalam dunia cyber dan beramah mesra dengan perbualan masing-masing sehingga hari ini. Rupa-rupanya ada kenangan di antara mereka berdua. Namun mereka bakal berkahwin dengan pasangan yang berlainan dari mereka dan kedua-duanya perlu bersanding di atas pelamin ketika majlis perkahwinan.

programme.title: Alahai Manisnya Madu
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zul yang berkahwin dua dan cuba untuk menyembunyikan perihal tersebut dari pengetahun Zian, isteri pertamanya dan Nani, isteri keduanya. Zul berkahwin dengan kedua-dua wanita tersebut hanya selang seminggu sahaja kerana terpikat dengan kedua dua wanita tersebut dalam masa yang sama.

programme.title: Tuah
programme.desc: Datuk Shaari dan Shahira diselamatkan oleh seorang lelaki yang mendakwa bahawa dirinya Hang Tuah, seorang pahlawan Melayu di abad ke-15. Meragui kisahnya, mereka membawanya melakukan pemeriksaan fizikal dan mental di hospital, lama-kelamaan Shahira mula mempercayainya. Tuah secara ajaibnya telah dibawa ke zaman moden dan mula mempelajari apa yang terjadi pada masa lalu. Akhirnya, Tuah pulang semula ke tempat asalnya dan mula membetulkan keadaan.

programme.title: Belum Berakhir
programme.desc: Awini seorang penyanyi kelab malam yang pernah menjalin hubungan dengan Fikri kembali menghantui hidup Fikri setelah lelaki itu meninggalkannya setelah berumah tangga dengan Dona. Pelbagai helah dilakukan Awini untuk menjejaskan hubungan Fikri dengan Dona agar Fikri kembali kepadanya.

programme.title: Tak Ori Tapi Ok
programme.desc: Keinginan seorang pengarah filem yang ingin menghasilkan naskhah baru. Yassin mahu melakukan kemunculan semula setelah sekian lama menemui jalan buntu dalam kerjayanya. Menemui seseorang yang mahu membiayai projek terbarunya, dia pun mula mencari pelakon-pelakon untuk membintanginya. Pelbagai rintangan dihadapinya dalam mencari pelakon yang boleh meniru gaya seperti P.Ramlee.

programme.title: Bumbung Kiah Lantai Tipah
programme.desc: Nor merupakan seorang pemandu teksi yang sudah berkahwin dua . Rumah isteri pertama dan keduanya hanya dipisahkan oleh satu tingkat namun isteri pertamanya Tipah, tidak tahu bahawa Kiah yang tinggal di atas rumahnya adalah madunya begitu juga Kiah. Mereka yang dahulunya sahabat mula bertengkar setelah mengetahui akan hal tersebut.

programme.title: Gemerlapan
programme.desc: Mimi mengejutkan ramai pelajar di sebuah kolej berprestij kerana menjadi seorang penggemar muzik dangdut yang tegar. Nel, salah seorang pelajar di situ menganggap muzik dangdut kekampungan dan mereka berdua sering bertengkar kerana hal tersebut. Tetapi tanpa disedari, Nel adalah Mr X yang selama ini merupakan peminat rahsia Mimi dalam diam.

programme.title: Kasih Suami Isteri
programme.desc: Azman dan Akil merupakan rakan sekerja dan juga rakan serumah. Setelah Azman berkahwin dengan Syanie, Akil menjadi segan untuk tinggal serumah kerana tidak mahu menganggu mereka namun Syanie menjodohkan Akil dengan sahabtnya Sally lalu mereka tinggal serumah bersama-sama. Pelbagai kisah menarik dalam kedua-dua pasangan ini dalam melayari bahtera perkahwinan.

programme.title: Kembar Siam
programme.desc: Berwajah serupa namun merupakan dua orang yang berbeza. Dua jejaka dengan kehidupan yang berlainan - seorang ingin menjadi pelakon filem terkenal namun gagal manakala seorang lagi merupakan pelakon filem terkenal namun mengimpikan kebebasan. Mereka bertemu dan merancang sesuatu yang malangnya hanya telah menimbulkan kekacauan dan kekeliruan orang sekeliling.

programme.title: Anak Abah
programme.desc: Zarith yang masih menuntut di luar negara terpaksa pulang ke tanah air untuk menjadi pengerusi dan menguruskan resort peninggalan ayahnya yang meninggal secara tiba-tiba akibat serangan jantung.Farhan yang merupakan salah seorang eksekutif resort tersebut tidak bersetuju di atas perlantikan tersebut kerana usia Zarith yang masih terlalu muda dan kurang pengalaman.Mujur ada Pak Din,pembantu peribadi arwah ayahnya dan Nina, setiausaha ayahnya yang selalu mendorong dan menyokong Zarith.

programme.desc: TVS Tengahari presents a comprehensive look at domestic and international news stories, providing viewers with an in-depth understanding of current affairs during the midday broadcast.

programme.title: Edisi Khas Ep12
programme.desc: Rangkuman Laporan Khas wartawan TVS dari pelbagai perspektif dan konteks

programme.title: Rezeki Air Ep3
programme.desc: The culture of Bidayuh life

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Staycation With Fattah S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Staycation With Fattah kembali lagi dengan Musim 3, menampilkan lebih banyak destinasi pelancongan menarik yang diterokai oleh Fattah di Sarawak, Negeri di Bawah Bayu Sabah, dan Semenanjung Malaysia.

programme.title: Arena Siber Ep10
programme.desc: Arena Siber mendedahkan keseimbangan bermain e-sukan dengan sihat serta cara menangani ketagihan. Dari pembangunan akar umbi, persediaan menggilap bakat, serta kisah kejayaan atlet.

programme.title: (DL) TVS Terkini
programme.desc: Terkini TVS brings the latest breaking news, offering quick and essential updates from both within the country and around the globe.

programme.title: Tanah Syurga Ep5
programme.desc: Kepulangan Andy ke Sarawak demi menjaga ibunya yang sakit disamping mengusahakan tanah pusaka peninggalan arwah ayah telah menimbulkan reaksi negatif abangnya, Jamal.

programme.title: (DL) TVS Highlight
programme.desc: TVS Highlight showcases the most current and important news in a compact, well-rounded format, featuring both local and international updates with thorough and succinct reporting.

programme.title: (L) Honourable Speech By Premier Of Sarawak
programme.desc: Watch live of the honourable speech by the Premier of Sarawak, Datuk Patinggi Tan Sri Abang Johari Tun Openg, at BCCK Kuching, Sarawak.

programme.title: (DL) TVS Terkini
programme.desc: Terkini TVS brings the latest breaking news, offering quick and essential updates from both within the country and around the globe.

programme.title: Delivery Girl Ep9
programme.desc: Drama komedi ringan yang menampilkan tiga gadis sekawan; LIVAN, MILAH & DOR yang bekerja sebagai gadis penghantar makanan dengan aplikasi yang dibangunkan sebuah startup tempatan bernama Smart Pertiwi.

programme.title: (L) Berita Wilayah TVS
programme.desc: Berita Wilayah TVS membawakan berita dari negeri-negeri di seluruh negara.

programme.title: Lifelong Learning S2 Ep11

programme.title: E-San Holy Trip
programme.desc: Rakan-rakan yang telah terpisah selama sedekad bertemu semula di pengebumian seorang rakan yang meninggal dunia yang membunuh diri dengan menggantung diri selepas kehilangan pekerjaan semasa pandemik COVID-19. Rakan yang mati itu dengan menggoda meninggalkan sepucuk surat dan teka-teki yang tersembunyi dalam pelbagai landskap yang indah di wilayah Ubon Ratchathanee kepada rakan-rakannya yang masih hidup, meminta mereka mengikuti laluan untuk menyelesaikan misi tertentu. Terdapat 3 peraturan tegar untuk diikuti. Mula-mula mereka perlu menumpang sahaja. Kedua, mereka hanya mempunyai 4 hari 3 malam. Dan ketiga sesiapa yang membaca surat ini juga mesti menyertai perjalanan tanpa sebarang alasan.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Larian Terakhir
programme.desc: Haziq, seorang anak tunggal kepada Mariam yang mempunyai bakat dalam larian pantas, sering berhadapan dengan dugaan kehidupan sehinggakan dia terpaksa meninggalkan ibunya yang sakit. Tanpa disedarinya, pertemuannya dengan Jalal telah memerangkapnya dalam sebuah sindiket jenayah. Walaupun Haziq dijanjikan peluang untuk memperbaiki hidupnya, Amelia sentiasa mengawasi setiap pergerakannya dengan teliti. Larian Terakhir adalah sebuah filem yang menggabungkan genre aksi dan sukan dengan penampilan pelakon-pelakon seperti Fattah Amin, Amyra Rosli, dan Fahrin Ahmad, di mana setiap larian akan sampai ke kemuncaknya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep6
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: The Real Parakang
programme.desc: Bagas mengamalkan ilmu hitam berbahaya yang dipanggil parakang. Bapa mertuanya, Rusman, menembaknya dalam usaha untuk mengelakkan lebih banyak korban. Pada masa yang sama, Elena, seorang wartawan dengan deria keenam, melihat seorang kanak-kanak mewarisi parakang.

programme.title: Sir Sa
programme.desc: Satu lagi kisah cinta segi tiga berlaku di kalangan kawan rapat yang jatuh cinta dengan gadis yang sama. Cerita itu bertukar atas dan ke bawah dengan ketawa dan kegembiraan, tetapi adakah salah satu daripada mereka akan mendapat pengakhiran yang bahagia

programme.title: Once Upon A Time
programme.desc: Sekumpulan kanak-kanak keluar dari rumah mereka dan mencari sebuah istana. Kanak-kanak itu semuanya berubah menjadi haiwan selepas ditangkap bermain di taman. Apabila seorang putera raja melintas, dia menyedari apa yang berlaku dan menggunakan pedang ajaibnya untuk membebaskan kanak-kanak daripada mantra sihir jahat.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S13 Ep3
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Missing You
programme.desc: Libby sering diganggu oleh roh sejak berpindah ke rumah baru. Dia fikir ibu tirinya, Karina, adalah punca, kerana dia mengoyakkan gambar ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Nothing Can Stop
programme.desc: Ini adalah kisah dua geng remaja yang kaya, Rama-rama dan Scorpions. Kedua-dua kumpulan saingan itu sentiasa bersaing dalam perlumbaan kereta. Mereka daripada keluarga kaya tetapi tidak lama kemudian mereka menyedari bahawa kehidupan di luar rumah mereka tidak selalunya mudah dan penuh dengan kekecewaan.

programme.title: Lembur
programme.desc: Mengisahkan beberapa pekerja yang terpaksa melakukan kerja lebih masa untuk memenuhi tarikh akhir bos mereka kerana dituduh plagiarisme. Pelbagai perkara yang tidak masuk akal berlaku. Kini mereka perlu memikirkan cara untuk keluar daripada pejabat.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Larian Terakhir
programme.desc: Haziq, seorang anak tunggal kepada Mariam yang mempunyai bakat dalam larian pantas, sering berhadapan dengan dugaan kehidupan sehinggakan dia terpaksa meninggalkan ibunya yang sakit. Tanpa disedarinya, pertemuannya dengan Jalal telah memerangkapnya dalam sebuah sindiket jenayah. Walaupun Haziq dijanjikan peluang untuk memperbaiki hidupnya, Amelia sentiasa mengawasi setiap pergerakannya dengan teliti. Larian Terakhir adalah sebuah filem yang menggabungkan genre aksi dan sukan dengan penampilan pelakon-pelakon seperti Fattah Amin, Amyra Rosli, dan Fahrin Ahmad, di mana setiap larian akan sampai ke kemuncaknya.

programme.title: Jalan Balik Surau
programme.desc: Ezad dan Yana terpaksa menghabiskan cuti sekolahnya di kampung. Ketika disana mereka mendapati terdapat sesuatu di sebalik surau Kampung Kemenyan?

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep6
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Nyawa Tak Mau Lepas Kerana Durhaka
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Sulis yang curang dengan suaminya dan derhaka kepada ibunya sendiri. Apakah yang membuatkan Sulis sedar?

programme.title: Dari Jauh
programme.desc: Ketika zaman kecilnya, Erul suka melihat persembahan ibunya, penyanyi kumpulan band kahwin, The Kugirans yang diketuai bapanya. Dalam perjalanan untuk menjayakan persembahan majlis perkahwinan, anggota band itu terbabit dalam kemalangan dan semuanya terkorban.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep5
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Gembira Waktu Siang Ep5
programme.desc: Gembira Waktu Siang (disingkat GWS) merupakan sebuah rancangan hiburan yang berkongsi kegembiraan menerusi beberapa segmen yang segar dan unik. Program ini dihoskan oleh Raffi Ahmad, Vega Darwanti, Prinsa Mandagie, Mandala Shoji, dan Jirayut.

programme.title: Ado Gawe Ep14
programme.desc: Program separa dokumentari yang menjemput anda untuk meneroka destinasi unik, menikmati pelbagai masakan dan mengalami budaya yang menarik. Temui tarikan menawan di Palembang, yang dikenali sebagai Venice dari Timur.

programme.title: Temenan Udah, Pacaran Yang Belum
programme.desc: Olive, seorang penjaga kedai perhiasan, suka mendekati lelaki yang sudah mempunyai kekasih. Namun, kenyataannya, lelaki yang didekati itu sudah tidak bmenyukainya lagi malah dianggap sebagai perosak kebahagiaan orang lain. Ilham sebagai kawan tidak mahu Olive terlibat dalam situasi ini kerana ia pasti melibatkan dirinya.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 33 Ep11
programme.desc: Setiap tahun, karnival SCTV mempunyai tema yang berbeza. Karnival ini menyajikan acara muzik yang paling menarik dan menampilkan ramai musikus serta selebriti terkemuka tanah air.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Ado Gawe Ep15
programme.desc: Program separa dokumentari yang menjemput anda untuk meneroka destinasi unik, menikmati pelbagai masakan dan mengalami budaya yang menarik. Temui tarikan menawan di Palembang, yang dikenali sebagai Venice dari Timur.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep99
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Ngga Usah Ngadi Ngadi Nanti Kamu Jatuh Hati
programme.desc: Derry memutuskan hubungan cintanya dengan Vina kerana mereka terlibat dalam pertengkaran dan salah faham. Derry yang kini semakin rapat dengan Elsa, membantu Elsa yang sedang menjual jagung bakar. Papa Derry yang mengetahui hal tersebut marah kepada Derry dan melarang Derry untuk mendekati Elsa lagi. Dia lebih setuju jika Derry bersama Vina. Menurut papa Derry, imej hotel akan menjadi buruk jika Derry terus bersama Elsa dan membantu Elsa menjual jagung bakar.

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep8
programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 2 Ep40
programme.desc: Musim kedua program pencarian bakat untuk menghafal al-Quran bagi kanak-kanak sehingga berusia 14 tahun kini kembali. Ikuti musim ini untuk menyaksikan bakat-bakat muda yang hebat dalam dunia penghafalan al-Quran.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep100
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Tukar Nasib Kok Jadi Makin Asik
programme.desc: Nila dan Fira adalah adik-beradik. Sifat Nila dan Fira sangatlah berbeza. Nila adalah seorang gadis cantik dan bergaya, dan Nila juga disukai oleh ramai lelaki di sekolahnya. Berbeza dengan Fira yang tampil sederhana dan biasa. Namun, Fira adalah seorang chef di sebuah restoran. Pada suatu ketika, Fira dan Nila terlibat pertengkaran di dalam kereta, dan akhirnya kereta yang mereka naiki melanggar pokok. Nila dan Fira dimasukkan ke hospital, dan nampaknya tubuh mereka telah tertukar.

programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 2 Ep41
programme.desc: Musim kedua program pencarian bakat untuk menghafal al-Quran bagi kanak-kanak sehingga berusia 14 tahun kini kembali. Ikuti musim ini untuk menyaksikan bakat-bakat muda yang hebat dalam dunia penghafalan al-Quran.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep101
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Istri Solehah Yang Berjuang Untuk Lepas Dari Belenggu Suami Pengkhianat
programme.desc: Nining menerima kiriman foto suaminya berkahwin lagi, dan dia seakan-akan tidak percaya. Dia merasa bersalah kerana meninggalkan ibunya, Mak Ana, demi merantau untuk mengejar cita-citanya menjadi seorang pramugari.

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep10

programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 6 (Repackaged) Ep9
programme.desc: The program has been refreshed and upgraded, departing from its initial structure. The topic of the show is "Listening to the Voice of the World, Singing With Legends." The musical extravaganza that will be created is full of infinite vitality and features over 30 singers, including Liu Yuning, Mao Buyi, Ma Jiaqi, Leo Ku, Hacken Lee, Tengger, and Gong Linna. The goal is to get back to the core of music and work together to produce fusion hits that will increase opportunities for collaboration and communication amongst the artists.

programme.title: Melody Journey (Repackaged) Ep6
programme.desc: This is the first original music performance program, which has invited singers such as Joker Xue, Jane Zhang, Zhou Shen, Shan Yichun, and Lars Huang. In addition to numerous emerging original music artists, it has also attracted veteran musicians such as Xiao Ke, Vincent Fang, and Huang Kuo-lun. The program consists of two core segments: a debut stage and a competition for an original song. This singer-songwriter interaction provides them a cooperative platform to produce a brand-new highlight for the Mandarin music scene.

They observe the children's growth throughout their cycling journey.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep183
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep184
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5007
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2273
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3924
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep252
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2275
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep186
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5009
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: An ordinary, cheerful and kind-hearted girl Bao, meets a troubled rich guy Edward by chance one summer. To ruin his fathers remarriage plans, Edward hires Bao and her friend to sabotage the wedding and that is how Bao and Edward meet and fall in love. All seems well for the sweet couple until their love quickly takes an unexpected turn

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: The story is about a super standard girl in school, May Who, is on a quest to win the love of a school senior heart-throbber, Fame, with her new-found friend, Pong. The only secret is that she can discharge electricity when she gets excited

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his fathers serious illness.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Old Fox
programme.desc: In 1989, young Liao Jie and his father save for a home, unaware of rising property prices. Frustrated by poverty, he learns from their landlord Old Fox who teaches him survival in society. Liao Jie ends up hurting Old Fox with what he has learnt, but his empathy prevents him from becoming like Old Fox.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her fathers underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macaus economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then

programme.title: As It Burns
programme.desc: Detective Wei investigates the death of Yan Zhen in an explosion which seems more than an accident to him. Wei then finds out that Yan Zhen looks a lot like Yin, the girlfriend of Yan Zhens childhood friend Lu, and uncovers a tangled web of deceit leading to surprising revelations when he merges details from the past and the present.

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says yes. Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeepers daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the walls?

programme.title: The Devil's Mirror
programme.desc: A power-hungry Witch who leads the Bloody Ghouls Clan, seeks two magical mirrors, Wind Mirror and Thunder Mirror, which are owned by Bai and the Wen Clan respectively. She needs both mirrors to find the location of a powerful weapon that will make her invincible and will stop at nothing to get her hands on them.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Muis embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from Nine Yang Scriptures by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lins husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lungs house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lungs mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

In Accused, viewers discover how an ordinary person gets caught up in an extraordinary situation, ultimately revealing how one wrong turn leads to another, until it's too late to turn back.

programme.title: Changing Planet S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Six presenters chart the fight to save the planet's endangered ecosystems. Gordon Buchanan returns to Brazil, Ella Al-Shamahi to Cambodia and Ade Adepitan to Kenya.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Kevin Whately - Robson heads to Northumberland to meet his acting hero, Kevin Whately. The pair have a go at sand art, go to sea in a rowing boat and test their musical skills on the border pipes.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Angela Lonsdale - Robson is reunited with longtime acting pal Angela Lonsdale for a weekend break in Northumberland. The pair try outdoor swimming and a laughter yoga session.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep6
programme.desc: First constructed in the 1930s, the West Side Line - an elevated viaduct section of the New York Central Railroad - was abandoned in the 1980s. But since 2009 it's been totally revitalised.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Brazil - Robson makes his way to South America to meet the marine life of Brazil.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Legacies Ep3
programme.desc: For every species on earth the right to mate is the purpose of life. Passing on your genes to the next generation is every animals legacy. But its not easy, it can be a struggle to find a mate and then a fight to gain access. Only the strongest and most determined will win at Luangwas mating game.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals 1 - Collar Complications Ep3
programme.desc: Rejoin the team for some post-rainy-season drama as they search for Ferinha, Fera, and Badalo, whose tracking collars are missing. Meet a new biologist who helps Lizzie recollar the jaguars, adding a high-tech device that will record even more data.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Endangered Species Ep3
programme.desc: Animals that were once near extinction find refuge in the safety of zoos. Celebrate the birth of red pandas, twin snow leopard cubs, a southern white rhino, and a Sulawesi macaque, all species that are endangered in the wild.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - And So it Begins… Ep1
programme.desc: Head to the heart of Central Kalimantan, Borneo - home to one of the most unique schools in the world. There are 68 students in all, including class clown Valentino (who loves a short-cut) and class couple Darril and Liti (who have their first fight).

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Earth Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Islands Ep2
programme.desc: Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Usana the Cheetah Cub Ep3
programme.desc: Usana, a cheetah cub is born with the odds stacked against her. Few cheetah cubs make it through their first year. Lucky for her, shes got an amazing mother who will stop at nothing to keep her cubs safe. Usana might just follow in her footsteps.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore Tasmanian devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.desc: Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Movin’ on Up Ep2
programme.desc: Best buds Valentino, Madara and Utris are ready for the next stage of forest school. Baby Clarita is at long last reunited with her mother. And toddler Mema discovers a tasty treat inside a rotten log (it can happen!).

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Back to School Ep1
programme.desc: Start a promising new term at the Orangutan Jungle School in Borneo. See newbie Bumi struggle to focus, track skittish Rumbas first timid steps toward independence, and cheer on star student Valentino as he experiences a bumpy start to college.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chico the Baby Capuchin Ep4
programme.desc: In Brazils Serra da Capivara, Chico, the baby capuchin monkey is learning to integrate into a troop with complicated rules, and exploring a forest full of excitement and danger. But mastering the art of tool use holds the key to his survival.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep6
programme.desc: The Ticket Trail / Flying Solo - Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas' diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep2
programme.desc: Tacos / Rainy Day - When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelps unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep7
programme.desc: Desert - Under orders from D-Structs, Scrappit steals one of Garby's parts, leading the Dinotrux on a trek through the desert to find help for their friend.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep8
programme.desc: Tortools - The Dinotrux find a nest of Tortool eggs. The hatchlings think Dozer is their mother and proceed to wreak havoc, painting everything in sight.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep2

programme.desc: The Ticket Trail / Flying Solo - Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas' diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep11
programme.desc: Angerdome / Tush Twins - Tip battles an alien as angry as she is at the Boov's Angerspringa festival./Sharzod and Lucy become besties and call themselves the Tush Twins.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep12
programme.desc: Sitting On Babies / Best Frenemies - Things go very wrong when Tip and Oh watch the Gorg babies at a cheese-themed playland/Captain Smek pretends to be Oh's friend just to ruin his day.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep28
programme.desc: Lucky and the No-Good Outlaw Butch Lepray - Lucky gets into trouble when the circus picks up a stranded woman who isn't what she seems

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep29
programme.desc: Lucky and the Big Goodbye - While Lucky attempts to win over a town that is unwelcoming to the circus, she starts to question her own reasoning to stay

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep30
programme.desc: Lucky and the Two-Wheeled Terror - When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep37
programme.desc: The Poison Ravine - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: No Bark, All Bite - Hiccup and Stoick set forth to find willow bark while Gobber holds a cookoff for the merchants until things go a riot and the riders have to protect Berk

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep15
programme.desc: Tip's Deep Dish / Garbage Day - When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep67
programme.desc: Spin Cycle - When a segment on Xixis show changes the kingdom Julien begins scheming ways to use the influence of the show to his advantage and creates a Juliencentric propaganda machine

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep41
programme.desc: Lucky and the Flight of the Fancy - Lucky, Julian and Aunt Cora get swept away in Julians new hot air balloon and must fend for themselves in the wilderness

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep41
programme.desc: How To Train Your Titmouse/The Good The Bad And The Bugly - Turbo takes Beakless under his wing during a battle of snails vs. birds; Chet is Sheriff of a western Turbotown and fights a gang of outlaw crickets.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep41
programme.desc: Blood Duel - When Zarkon demands a tradeoff, the team has a difference of opinion on what to do; Meanwhile, Haggarobsesses over the past

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep15
programme.desc: Scrambled Eggs/George Stephenson - Sherman accidentally swaps a class project with a dinosaur egg that hatches on stage, so Peabody must help to send it back before it ruins the show

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep55
programme.desc: Count On Fifi - Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppy's stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isn't enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep56
programme.desc: Poppy The Line Dancing Queen - Poppy is having a line dancing party, but none of the other flowertots know how to do it. Will any of them learn to dance in time or will Poppy have to cancel the party?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Toyland Mischief Maker - When Big Ears' teapot goes missing, Noddy is surprised to find it hanging from a lamp post. And when Bumpy's kennel goes missing too, it's clear there's a mischief maker in Toyland. Noddy needs to investigate before Toyland descends into chaos. Using his investigating kit and with Revs and Bumpy to help, Noddy discovers that it was the Naughticorns playing a game of Dare and daring each other to do silly things. The Naughticorns apologise for creating mischief in Toyland and Noddy finds a way for everyone to play the dare game together safely! Go, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Popping Balloons - Noddy and his friends are each given a balloon at the end of Smartysaurus's Science Party. But when lots of the balloons start going pop, Noddy decides to investigate why. Realising that someone must be hiding and popping them, he follows the clues to PatPat and then to the Naughticorns before eventually working out that the balloon poppers are the Ninjas. They've been playing their favourite game: Ninja-Balloon-Pop! Noddy helps them to see that while they were having fun, everyone else was getting upset. Back at the Dino-Lab, the Ninjas apologise and this time everyone happily joins in with a game of Ninja-Balloon-Pop. Case closed! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep29
programme.desc: Why Wildebeest Stampede - You see there was a time when Wildebeest didn't stampede. They used to stand on the plains and munch grass all day. But there were so many of them and they were eating so much grass that all the animals had to do something about it. Tortoise realized that the Wildebeest weren't the brightest animals in Tinga Tinga and they always did whatever the last beast said. So the animals decided to tell the Wildebeest that they were welcome to stay in Tinga Tinga and they must never RUN!' So what did the Wildebeest do? They ran and they ran and they RAN! So that's Why Wildebeest Stampede! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep30
programme.desc: Why Chameleon Changes Colour - You see there was a time when Chameleon wasn't bright and colourful at all. In fact Chameleon was rather dull and grey like a rainy day. One day when all the animals are playing games and sheltering from the rains Chameleon decides to slip away because he feels boring. Butterfly comes across Chameleon sitting sadly on a rock and shows him a rainbow. Chameleon can't resist and stands on the Rainbow, and TA-DAH!! He turns red and yellow and pink and green! Chameleon soaks up all the colours of the magical rainbow and now, KAPOW!! Chameleon can be any colour he wants! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep29
programme.desc: Homesick Tin Top - Tin Top just can't master corners no matter how hard he tries. The other cars try to help him to no avail until Roary hits on a brilliant plan.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep30
programme.desc: Save Our Tree - Mr Carburettor is planning on cutting down Flash's tree. What can be done to save the poor rabbit's home?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep23
programme.desc: King Burple - After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.desc: Tail to the Chief / Chaser and Chewer: Part Chew - When Tag volunteers to be Mayor for the day, she promises everyone an ice cream party. But as she tries to do everything herself, the party plans begin to fall apart. Until Tag realizes that being a great Mayor means knowing when to ask for help. / Comic book villains Flea and Thunder (aka Frank and Beans) have teamed up with a Wicked Chicken to cause chicken-related havoc on Pawston. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.desc: Lucky Penny / Hammys Day Out - Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now its up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep3
programme.desc: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure - Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep9
programme.desc: Sandstorm - The Dinotrux get caught in a powerful sandstorm that stops them in their tracks, which leaves Ty Rux and the Reptools to find a way to save them.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep10
programme.desc: Fake Ravine - When the Dinotrux settle together in the crater, D-Structs decides to go after their most important resource: the Reptools.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep3
programme.desc: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure - Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep7
programme.desc: Mailed Away / The Wandering Wand - When Harper unknowingly drops her cooking camp application on the way to post office, its up to the Dew Drops to get it into that big blue mailbox. / When Cassie accidentally places Lola's beloved, old toy wand in a box marked for a giveaway drive in the park, the Dew Drops must find a way to retrieve the wand before it ends up in the hands of an entirely new family.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep13
programme.desc: Podlings / Dumpster Dining - Oh's family reunion ends up turning into a disastrous family Tip and Oh secretly turn Lucy's craft store into a trendy new Boovian restaurant.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep14
programme.desc: Boy Boy Girl Band / Lords And Lazers - Tip and Oh try sneaking into a concert but almost destroy Human-Boov relations forever; K-Trong invites Tip and Oh to a make-believe game weekend.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep31
programme.desc: Lucky and the Rough Ride - The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, its up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep32
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ghostly Gotcha! - When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare hell never forget!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep33
programme.desc: Lucky and the Doomed Delivery - Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep57
programme.desc: War of the Cheeks - Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep59
programme.desc: Birthday Blues - Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep40
programme.desc: A Teacup Filled with the Self - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Deeper Look
programme.desc: Is AI being misused by powerful tech companies and governments to manipulate us, and how can we prevent it from becoming weaponized? Maria Ressa shares her insights.

programme.title: Dig More Japan
programme.desc: The Japanese love finding ways to reuse things that are discarded or broken. We see how a little ingenuity can make life a whole lot richer.

programme.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.
